sub_title: Director Launch Excellence (International Region, Canada Europe Australia Japan) at Alnylam Pharmaceuticals
summary:
To acquire a position in an organization that will allow me to apply my skills and provide the opportunity to contribute to the overall goals. I am a hard working, and active individual who works well as part of a team or by myself with creativity and initiative.

Specialties: International Business skills knowledge, multilingual capabilities (Italian, English, basic Spanish and Swedish), international living and working experiences, mainly in Europe (The Netherlands, Ukraine, Sweden, Ireland). Basic knowledge of HTML, Dreamweaver, ArcGIS software for spatial analysis, TrackWise, SAP.

education.degree_name: Economic growth, innovation and spatial dynamics

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead Launch Excellence team to create, manage, communicate, and optimize the interdependent and cross-functional launch plans for commercial stage programs 
•	Assess and monitor brand’s readiness for launch through timely tracking of and reporting on internal milestones using Regional frameworks and launch tools 
•	Identify risks to Regional Launch Excellence and drive resolution of these complex issues 
•	Partner closely with the Regional and Country Brand Leads, Brand teams, cross-functional work stream leaders and the corporate capability team to accomplish the above 
•	Provide objective assessments of progress and barriers to launch progress and generate a launch readiness scorecard to be reviewed with Regional Management Team 
•	Document and educate organization on launch best practices 
•	Support scalable development of launch capabilities, technology, and business process 

•	Identify gaps in critical cross-functional practices, and expertise required to drive business performance and work with regional team to develop solutions and innovative brand initiatives 
•	Establish clear readiness milestones and deliver guidance on metrics to assess launch effectiveness for each country 
•	Provide continuous improvement and best practices guidance to enhance future launch effectiveness
profile_positions.title: Director Launch Excellence (EU 5, Japan, Australia, Mid-Size markets) at Alnylam Pharmaceuticals

profile_positions.description:
- Develop systems and implement processes to provide transparency of Alnylam plans for launches in each country 
- Review feasibility of tech ops activities for launch readiness 
- Responsible that artwork timelines are aligned with company goals. 
- Ensure Commercial alignment for launch timing and reimbursement 
- Ensure local requirements for commercial launches are understood and properly planned 
- Update and Validate regulatory filing timelines 
- Manage timeline conflict between multiple launches and align organization toward achievable goals
profile_positions.title: Associate Director Global Expansion

profile_positions.description:
Objectives:
•	Regional Operations Lead-Kyprolis,Parsabiv, Mimpara in Europe, Russia, CIS, Balkans & Israel (inline products).
•	Regional Operations Lead is a spider in the web ensuring that our medicines are available in time to support new product launches or the introduction of new configurations. Additionally, as Regional Operation Lead coordinate the different life cycle management initiatives in the product portfolio, operating in a cross functional environment, being the liaison between multiple disciplines within Amgen, e.g. commercial brand teams, global product delivery team affiliate’s , manufacturing, regulatory affairs, quality etc. Such requires skills and competences as project management, communication and relationship building skills, have an eye for the big picture but, also know that the devil is in the detail under a constantly changing and challenging environment.

Responsibilities
•	Generate project charters for launches, new devices/strengths introductions and ensure project gate review in alignment with regional commercialization process.
•	Serve as Regional Operations representative and core member to Global Operations Team(s), Brand Team(s), Development Team(s) and Global Launch Team(s).
•	Liaise with the production, packaging and distribution sites for a given product for on time an in full (non interrupted) supply.
•	Lead of Regional Operations Teams
•	Meet launch and product life cycle site readiness milestones reporting on a timely manner to stakeholders and management.
•	Ensure regular project status updates both internally to Regional Operations Team members, and external (to the project stake holders, including Brand Team, Management Team and Global Operations Team).
•	Under operational excellence permanent culture, identify improvements in the commercialization process and work with the right partners to implement these improvements
profile_positions.title: Regional Operations Sr.Manager (Supply Chain) for Europe, Switzerland, Russia, CIS, Balkans & Israel

profile_positions.description:
Project management
- Develop project plans for new product launches and product life cycle management (variations implementation) 
- Lead/participate in cross-functional team to ensure timely completion of project tasks and delivery of project objectives
- Own/perform change control management related to readiness activities
- Track progress, identify issues or timeline risks and escalate risks
- Execute ad-hoc projects
- Operational Excellence:
      - Foresee and analyze complex problems, identifying opportunities to streamline departmental     
        activities
      - Lead projects to drive process improvements or suggest standardized methods/templates
